shortDescription: WAVLINK WN572HP3, WN533A8, WN530H4, WN535G3, WN531P3 login.cgi has no filtering on parameter key, which leads to command injection in page /login.shtml.
vulnerabilityName: WAVLINK WN572HP3, WN533A8, WN530H4, WN535G3, WN531P3 login.cgi Command Injection
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
